predicate.note: Frames file for 'dissolve' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry other_cos-45.4, other framed members include alter, decrease, halt, narrow, shut, slow, sweeten, weaken and worsen. No comparison.

example.name: from the corpus
example.text: He joins Nov. 13, *trace* dissolving his consulting firm, Canter, Achenbaum Associates.
example.arg: his consulting firm, Canter, Achenbaum Associates

example.name: with medium
example.text: John dissolved the poison in Mary's wine.

example.name: medium as subject
example.text: The strong acid dissolved the grease stains on John's bathtub. Unfortunately it also dissolved the bathtub.
example.arg: the grease stains on John's bathtub

example.name: with components
example.text: John dissolved his corporation into three spinoff companies.
